executable.title: Estimate Mean Diffusivity in each voxel
executable.description: Estimate Mean Diffusivity in each voxel. \n\ Examples: \n\ MeanDiffusivityEstimator dwi.txt D_sh4_ra1.nii.gz --sh 4 --ra 1

file.name: _InputFile
file.label: DWI Configuration File
file.description: Text file that contains b values, gradient orientations, and DWI images.

image.name: _OutputFile
image.description: Output Image File where each voxel is a scalar MD value.

integer.name: _NumberOfThreads
integer.description: Number of threads. If it not positive, then the default number for multiple threads is used.
